title: Need typesetting services urgently
content:
I need a simple typesetting job in [Quicksilver](http://web.archive.org/web/20071118044317/http:/typophile.com/node/3030) for a slide of my presentation Saturday at [Typo Berlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20071118044317/http:/www.typoberlin.de/index.php/Stephen+Coles;107/1). Can anyone who can help me please contact me through my profile? Thank you very much.

 [‹ External Harddrives?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071118044317/http:/typophile.com/node/33689 "Go to previous forum topic") [. . . and Garamond is great why? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071118044317/http:/typophile.com/node/33652 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bald Condensed
